name: The Wheel
description:
You defied the god of time, now you must run from it in order to survive.

Ludum Dare post jam version of The Wheel.

-- Controls --

z => Attack

x => Jump

arrows keys => move and jump

space => pause

-- Credits --

Our first ever game jam entry.

Programmed by Erdal Ural

Artwork by İdil Kıtır
